entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25 with temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 25 with temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
